getBuyers

public java.util.Collection<? extends MemberGroup> getBuyers()
Description copied from interface: GuaranteeService
It returns the associated buyers according to the logged user. If the user is an administrator then it returns all buyer groups. If the user is an issuer it returns all groups according to the 'issueCertifications' permission. Otherwise it returns all groups which contains the logged user in its 'buyWithPaymentObligations' collection permission.

Specified by:
getBuyers in interface GuaranteeService

getGuarantees

public java.util.List<Guarantee> getGuarantees(Certification certification,
                                               PageParameters pageParameters,
                                               java.util.List<Guarantee.Status> statusList)
Description copied from interface: GuaranteeService
Returns guarantees matching the given criteria

Specified by:
getGuarantees in interface GuaranteeService

getIssuers

public java.util.Collection<? extends MemberGroup> getIssuers()
Description copied from interface: GuaranteeService
It returns the associated issuers according to the logged user. If the user is an administrator then it returns all issuer groups. If the user is a buyer then returns all groups which contains the logged user in its 'issueCertifications' collection permission. Otherwise (if the logged user is a seller) return all issuers according to all its buyers. There is only a "@MemberAction" annotation without permissions because all the members could view the issuers.

Specified by:
getIssuers in interface GuaranteeService

getIssuers

public java.util.Collection<? extends MemberGroup> getIssuers(GuaranteeType guaranteeType)
Description copied from interface: GuaranteeService
It returns the issuer groups which has permission over the specified guarantee type.

Specified by:
getIssuers in interface GuaranteeService

getRelatedGuaranteeModels

public java.util.Collection<GuaranteeType.Model> getRelatedGuaranteeModels()
Description copied from interface: GuaranteeService
Lists guarantee's models which has the logged member (or operator's own member) as buyer, seller or issuer without take into account any other property.

Specified by:
getRelatedGuaranteeModels in interface GuaranteeService

getSellers

public java.util.Collection<? extends MemberGroup> getSellers()
Description copied from interface: GuaranteeService
It returns the associated seller groups according to the logged user. If the user is an administrator then return all seller groups. If the user is an issuer return all sellers according to all (buyer) groups associated to its 'issueCertifications' permission. Otherwise returns all groups according to its 'buyWithPaymentObligations' permission

Specified by:
getSellers in interface GuaranteeService

public boolean isBuyer()
Description copied from interface: GuaranteeService
It checks if the logged user belongs to a buyer group

Specified by:
isBuyer in interface GuaranteeService
Returns:
true only if the logged user's group has the 'buyWithPaymentObligations' permission enabled.

Returns:
